description: A wandering samurai from Inazuma, Kazuha is an Anemo sword user who excels at grouping enemies and boosting his team's Elemental DMG.
info: Kazuha is a top-tier Anemo support who excels at grouping enemies, triggering Swirl, and boosting Elemental DMG. Build him for Elemental Mastery and Energy Recharge.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Garyuu Bladework
skills.desc: Performs up to 5 rapid strikes with a sword.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 rapid strikes with a sword.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to unleash two rapid sword strikes.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Chihayaburu
skills.desc: Kazuha pulls enemies and objects towards him, dealing Anemo DMG and launching himself into the air.
skills.details_html:
Chihayaburu
Pulls enemies and objects towards Kazuha, dealing Anemo DMG and launching himself into the air. Hold to increase AoE and DMG.

skills.name: Kazuha Slash
skills.desc: Kazuha performs a single slash, creating a field that deals AoE Anemo DMG and boosts Elemental DMG for party members inside.
skills.details_html:
Kazuha Slash
Performs a single slash, creating a field that deals AoE Anemo DMG and boosts Elemental DMG for party members inside. Lasts for 8s.

passive_talents.name: Cloud Strider
passive_talents.desc: Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.

passive_talents.name: Soumon Swordsmanship
passive_talents.desc: If Chihayaburu comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro, it will absorb that element and deal additional DMG of that type.

passive_talents.name: Poetics of Fuubutsu
passive_talents.desc: Upon triggering a Swirl reaction, Kazuha grants teammates a 0.04% Elemental DMG Bonus to their corresponding element for every point of Elemental Mastery he has for 8s.

constellations.name: Yamaarashi Tailwind
constellations.desc: The field created by Kazuha Slash increases Elemental Mastery of characters inside by 200.

constellations.name: Maple Monogatari
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Chihayaburu by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Oozora Genpou
constellations.desc: When Kazuha's Energy is below 45, he regenerates 3 Energy per second.

constellations.name: Wisdom of Bansei
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Kazuha Slash by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Crimson Momiji
constellations.desc: After using Chihayaburu or Kazuha Slash, Kazuha's attacks deal an additional 0.2% of his Elemental Mastery as DMG for 5s.
